TopicTitle: Any way to restore Mystery Goo Unit and SC 9001 easily after collecting data

Articles.Content:
Action group is useless.It only works before data collecting.It means nothing after experiment storage unit collects data.

I put 3 Mestery Goo and 3 SC 9001 in my rover.When the data collection is done,all I can do is to stop the rover,let scientist getting out for EVA,and restore euqipments mannually one by one.

I don't want to click the "resore" buttons so many times.Is there any simple method?
The laboratory module can clean used experiments for as long as it has a scientist inside. Other than that, you need mods.

You can add a antenna and solar panels. Once you do an experiment, press the blue transmit button when the results pop up. You will not get as many science as you will if you restored it, but you could travel really far. Also, you would need relays. A pic could help.

2 hours ago, Cant think of a username said:

Transmit doesn't allow you to reset Goo or Jr modules.

You'll need a Scientist on EVA, a Lab module or a mod for that,
